answers.answer: Tremors (Posteral, Intentional or Essential) are very common sx's of MS. I am VERY surprised they did not catch that at the NMSS! Here is a link that describes the 3 different types of MS Tremors.http://www.webmd.com/multiple-sclerosis/guide/managing-related-tremorsJust remember that if they do not describe hers exactly, you may want to take her age into consideration. Good luck!

question: My mom is 73 and has MS. She shakes constantly and this shaking affects her speech. Someone from the local MS society told her this shaking is probably something else. She also suffers from diabetes. Could you please shed some insight for me about this shaking and speech problems.Thanks
